error.error-loading-company: The company could not be loaded. It could have been deleted by another user or the server is not responding.

company.no-child-units: There are no substructures for this structure yet

delete-dialog.general-do-you-want-to-delete: Do you really want to delete {{value}} ?

dialog-component.date-range-within-another-date-range: The start and end dates must not overlap with any other cycle range.
dialog-component.start-date-not-before-end-date: The start date cannot be before the end date.
dialog-component.start-equals-end: The start value must not be the same as the target value.

navigation-sidebar.cycle-not-started: This cycle has not yet started and can be processed in preparation.
navigation-sidebar.cycle-started: This cycle has already expired and is therefore closed - processing is only possible to a limited extent.

warning.no-smtp-link: This can severely limit the usability of the <br class="hidden-l-up">application.
warning.no-smtp-text: Warning: No SMTP server has been configured.
